items.title: Israel-Palestine: the bereaved parents bringing hope to a divided land
bullets: • Palestinians and Israelis are working to build peace where politics has failed
• They are united in loss: specifically, the loss of a child
• Something else unites them: a determination to build bridges of shared understanding
• The fighting has to end, and bereaved parents are better placed than most to achieve that

items.title: Why do only some leaves turn red in the fall? Scientists can't agree on an answer
bullets: • Scientists can't agree on why only some autumn leaves turn red in the fall
• Every autumn, trees break down chlorophyll in their leaves to recover precious nitrogen before the leaves fall
• The loss of this chlorophll exposes yellow pigments that have been there in the leaves all along

items.title: California man who survived 20 days in snowy wilderness says it was walk or die
bullets: • Ron Dailey went missing in the Sierra national forest in Fresno county after taking a solo hunting trip there on 13 October
• Dailey's pickup truck broke down while he was at an elevation of more than 10,000ft, stranding him there with what he estimated to be about two weeks’ worth of food and water

items.title: Trump once again nominates tech space traveler Jared Isaacman to serve as NASA administrator
bullets: • Trump once again nominates tech space traveler Jared Isaacman to serve as NASA administrator

• Trump announced in late May that he had decided to withdraw Isaacman after a "thorough review" of his "prior associations" Weeks after the withdrawal, Trump went further in expressing his concerns about Isaacman's Republican credentials
• Trump made no mention of his previous decision to nominate Isaacman in his Tuesday evening announcement

items.title: Skeleton Crew: A Decent Ride That Never Reaches Hyperspace
bullets: • A lot of people have compared Skeleton Crew to The Goonies, but I don't think that comparison holds up
• Instead of an adventure filled with discovery and personal growth, this show feels more like a journey that just needed to hit a “yay, we did it” moment
• The themes of independence are there, and there are good ideas throughout
